snippet: Twelve students were suspended and more than 50 others face suspensions in a continuing investigation of cheating during final exams in June, school officials said.
abstract: Twelve Stuyvesant High School students are suspended and more than 50 others are facing suspension because of new evidence that has emerged in a continuing investigation of cheating during final exams in June.
lead_paragraph: Twelve students were suspended and more than 50 others face suspensions in a continuing investigation of cheating during final exams in June, school officials said.

headline.seo: 12 Students Suspended in Cheating Plot At Stuyvesant High School
headline.main: Students Are Suspended in Stuyvesant Cheating
headline.print_headline: Students Are Suspended In Stuyvesant Cheating
